document.full_text: new jersey suffered its second downgrade this year on wednesday after moody's investors service cut its credit rating, tarnishing gov. chris christie's budget fighting reputation as he works to close a $4 billion shortfall.
document.title: moody's cuts new jersey rating a notch on finances
lines_and_colors: new jersey suffered its second downgrade this year on wednesday after moody's investors service cut its credit rating, tarnishing gov. chris christie's budget fighting reputation as he works to close a $4 billion shortfall.
